snippet: Video from Iranian television showed the aftermath of a bomb attack that reportedly killed an Iranian nuclear scientist in Tehran on Wednesday.
abstract: Video from Iranian television showed the aftermath of a bomb attack that reportedly killed an Iranian nuclear scientist in Tehran on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: As my colleagues Alan Cowell and Rick Gladstone report, an Iranian nuclear scientist was said to be killed in a bomb attack on his car in Tehran on Wednesday.

headline.main: Video From Iran Shows Bombing Aftermath
